DOC.brief_title: Genetic Counseling Lifestyle Change Diabetes Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine impact diabetes genetic counseling patient motivation disease prevention behavior among subject pre-diabetes . We randomize subject pre-diabetes genetic test vs. genetic test order obtain unconfounded test hypothesis genetic test change patient behavior . Intervention subject provide individual diabetes genotype risk score derive aggregate combine result 37 diabetes risk-associated genetic locus . Because patient receive either `` Higher risk '' `` Lower risk '' genetic test result , separately examine impact `` Higher risk '' `` Lower risk '' test result compare untested control . All subject enrol 12-week diabetes prevention program .
